sentence: Rep. David Schweikert’s campaign committee agreed to pay a $125,000 fine to the Federal Election Commission for misusing donations and failing to adequately report other transactions, according to disclosures filed Friday by the FEC.
author: Yvonne Wingett Sanchez
title: Rep. David Schweikert's campaign agrees to $125,000 fine for reporting violations

sentence: The other shoe has dropped for Rep. David Schweikert (R-AZ).
author: Roger Sollenberger
title: GOP Congressman Fined $125,000 For Financial Violations

sentence: "No one has been more directly harmed by the malfeasance of Congressman Schweikert's former Chief of Staff than Friends of David Schweikert," said Chris Baker, a spokesperson for Schweikert's campaign committee, in a statement to Newsweek.
author: Aaron McDade
title: Rep. David Schweikert's Campaign Committee Fined $125K For Misusing Funds

sentence: Arizona Republic Rep. David Schweikert’s campaign committee agreed to pay a $125,000 fine to theFederal Election Commission for misusing donations and failing to adequately report other transactions, according to disclosures filed Friday by the FEC.
author: Yvonne Wingett Sanchez
title: Rep. David Schweikert's campaign to pay $125,000 fine for 'knowing and willful' reporting violations

sentence: Business Insider reports that Rep. David Schweikert (R-Ariz.) has agreed to a penalty payment of $125,000.
author: Meaghan Ellis
title: GOP lawmaker hit with $125K FEC fine for repeated campaign law violations

sentence: Business Insider reports that Rep. David Schweikert (R-Ariz.) has agreed to a penalty payment of $125,000.
author: Meaghan Ellis
title: GOP lawmaker fined for campaign law violations
